title: When you research into Corki's Taunts
body:
and learn how foul mouthed he is
https://45.media.tumblr.com/c0f57ff396e27e59c9814f4e7cfb7df3/tumblr_nfi1uicfjg1thnx1po1_400.gif

replies.body: Well, that's aviator slang for you. Impenetrable jargon and lots of swearing.
Wow, Corki just gained about 10 points of bad-assery for me.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mef325e6v61rfu5pbo1_r1_500.gif
"Someone put soap in Corki's foul mouth!" -Concerned Asian Parent
People dropped it.

Corki was already cool

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TplL-G-qbww
This is literally the reason I bought Corki.

Rito dude:Um...Are you sure we can put {{champion:42}} to say THESE aviator slangs?
Rito manager:Are you STILL worried about that?Look,if we can get away with {{champion:412}} 's lore we can get away with anything!

{{champion:104}} 
If they can get away with anything, why the f** did they take my ...
Because they can get away with anything. Except the cigar.
Rio dude: Who the fuck is Thresh?

Rito manager:...
http://i.imgur.com/8eQqot7.gif
You are demoted to janitor,you can find the mops at the fourth door to the right...
Pretty much....
Yep. Exactly my reaction. Have my upvote.

When I first bought Corki and heard his Champion Select quote I thought he said something along the lines of;

"I'm up to stfu gots me an AD Sheen".
Lol, you better check your hearing
Oh my eyesight is trash but my hearing is significantly above most other people. I wonder what people with _bad_ hearing would think of Corki's quotes.
"I'm up on snuff, and goats ate my Machine!" XD
I hear something pretty similar. I heard "I'm stuffed on snus and gots are my sheen!"
lol it feels so good knowing what this post means without having to google

> [{quoted}](name=Luffy The Pirate,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FqXx5osR,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-12-19T19:07:38.690+0000)
>
> lol it feels so good knowing what this post means without having to google

yup
Had to double check some things, because the last time I actually payed attention to his quotes was years ago.
But Graves can't have a Cigar.
The Graves' cigar thing starting to become as annoying as the "Lee Sin most OP champ ever" and "Riven noobchamp" posts.
im with you here..... i honestly just dont care about the cigar...... maybe he didnt want cancer

But he CAN have a cigar.

http://oi64.tinypic.com/24vl30i.jpg

...all you have to do is give him one.
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/glee/images/7/73/Genius-new.gif/revision/latest?cb=20110721075800
Thanks, but...the genius solutions are often the simplest ones. ;)
Holy crap, Corki! I THOUGHT YOU WERE JUST MY LITTLE AVIATOR YORDLE WTF!!!
You're a Delta Sierra!
And you were made from a Charlie Foxtrot ye Bravo! :D
He's pretty racist and sexist.
Why is Corki the only male Yordle that has fleshy skin?
Because he was made before there was any unified design for Yordles. Back then anything that was under 2 feet tall was a Yordle
Maybe he needs a rework?
Maybe he shaves it off.
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Corki/SkinsTrivia

Corki - translations
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1894561

Woah. XD

Calling his enemies dumb shits and describing every battle as a cluster fuck.
Don't forget they are weak dicks.
lmao, Corki is a bronze player!
Corki is a Lima Alpha Delta
Yep...
who else googled what his taunt was
{{champion:42}} Great game other team! You did your best. Sierra Charlie Romeo Uniform Bravo Sierra. . .
His quotes have always been my favorite since so few know what he's saying....Lima Oscar Lima! {{champion:42}}
When his movement quote is taken from David Bowie song :D
Whiskey tango foxtrot is coming out of his mouth?!
Ouch
You whisky delta.
